Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at ARIA Resort & Casino places you in the heart of Las Vegas, minutes from Crystals at City Center and close to University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of The Linq and High Roller.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 4004 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After enjoying recreational amenities such as a nightclub and an outdoor pool, a lucky night at the casino is the perfect end to the day. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 16 restaurants and 3 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 13 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Las Vegas? This resort has 300,000 square feet (27871 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 16 restaurants and 3 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 13 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

After enjoying recreational amenities such as a nightclub and an outdoor pool, a lucky night at the casino is the perfect end to the day. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.
Make yourself at home in one of the 4004 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

A stay at ARIA Resort & Casino places you in the heart of Las Vegas, minutes from Crystals at City Center and close to University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of The Linq and High Roller.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Crystals at City Center - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
The Linq - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
High Roller - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
The Auto Collections - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Fashion Show Mall - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Bali Hai Golf Club - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Orleans Arena - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Las Vegas Convention Center - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for ARIA Resort & Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 3.1 km / 2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for ARIA Resort & Casino at CityCenter is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 3.2 km / 2 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
A minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of at least $39.00 (plus applicable tax) per room, per day, will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. This fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees that they may be responsible for but is not a guarantee of the final amount due. For a detailed description of what is included in the mandatory fee, please see hotel policies.

Minimum self-parking fees and valet parking fees are charged by the hour per room, per vehicle. These fees are tiered by hourly increments and collected by the hotel at check in or check out. The fee amounts are subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for but not a guarantee of the final amount due.

Smoking Restoration Fee - Smoking will incur a nonrefundable fee with the hotel. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees that they may be responsible for but is not a guarantee of the final amount due. For a further information please contact the hotel directly. Fee amounts vary and are subject to change.

RoomType.text: Double 1 Bedroom Penthouse Suite with Strip View

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 05/Mar/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: This hotel charges guests a daily Resort Fee of $32 plus tax per room, per night payable directly to the hotel. Max Length-of-Stay is 14 nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. The fitness center access is for guests over 18 years old only. SELF PARKING RATES: The self-parking fee is $7 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 4 hours and $10 for vehicles parked over 4 hours to 24 hours at the following resorts For vehicles that are self-parked at these resorts over 24 hours, there is an additional self-parking fee of $10 for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours. VALET PARKING RATES: The valet parking fee is $13 for the first 4 hours (no grace period) and $18 for over 4 hours to 24 hours at the following resorts For vehicles that are valet parked at these resorts over 24 hours, there is an additional valet parking fee of $18 for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours (no grace period) Early check in is not charged in any of MGM properties, however, based on availability at the property discretion Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 09/Oct/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: A daily resort fee of $39.00 plus applicable tax will be applied to all reservations. The resort fee includes: Property-wide high speed internet access (public spaces and in-room), unlimited local and toll free calls, airline boarding pass printing and notary service. Max Length-of-Stay is 14 nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. The fitness center access is for guests over 18 years old only. SELF PARKING RATES: The self-parking fee is $9 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 2 hours and $15 for vehicles parked over 2 to 4 hours and $18 over 24 hours VALET PARKING RATES: The valet parking fee is $21 for the first 2 hours (no grace period), $24 for 2 hours to 4 hours and $30 over 24 hours Early check in is not charged in any of MGM properties, however, based on availability at the property discretion Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 11/Oct/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: A daily resort fee of $39.00 plus applicable tax will be applied to all reservations. The resort fee includes: Property-wide high speed internet access (public spaces and in-room), unlimited local and toll free calls, airline boarding pass printing and notary service. Max Length-of-Stay is 14 nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. The fitness center access is for guests over 18 years old only. SELF PARKING RATES: The self-parking fee is $9 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 2 hours and $15 for vehicles parked over 2 to 4 hours and $18 over 24 hours VALET PARKING RATES: The valet parking fee is $21 for the first 2 hours (no grace period), $24 for 2 hours to 4 hours and $30 over 24 hours Early check in is not charged in any of MGM properties, however, based on availability at the property discretion Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Note: * Minimum check-in age is 21 years old* * Name changes are prohibited.* * There is a resort fee payable by the guest.* * All the rooms in the Resort Tower are non-smoking. * This hotel has a Maximum 14 night stay restriction.* * The hotel Pool open year round during days.* * Please be advised there is a fee for early departure.* **At check in all guests will be required to present a Major Credit Card to cover applicable charges for room, tax and resort fees, as well as a incidental amount per day.**

RESORTFEE Charges: 273.00 USD (Excluded i.e. pay to hotel at the time of check-In)

Note: * Minimum check-in age is 21 years old* * Name changes are prohibited.* * There is a resort fee payable by the guest.* * All the rooms in the Resort Tower are non-smoking. * This hotel has a Maximum 14 night stay restriction.* * The hotel Pool open year round during days.* * Please be advised there is a fee for early departure.* **At check in all guests will be required to present a Major Credit Card to cover applicable charges for room, tax and resort fees, as well as a incidental amount per day.**
